module.name: Recordings
module.description: Creates and manages system recordings, used by many other modules (eg, IVR).
module.changelog: *3.4.0.3* FREEPBX-7399 Made sorting and delete standards compliant *3.4.0.2* Diverge Track *3.3.11.9* Replace select/drop boxes with autocomplete box *3.3.11.8* use AMPASTERISKGROUP, don't hardcode *3.3.11.7* #5654 *3.3.11.6* cleanup empty return value *3.3.11.5* #5478 *3.3.11.4* #5463 *3.3.11.3* Categorization changes *3.3.11.2* #4001 *3.3.11.1* #4740 *3.3.11.0* #4651, #4653, #4579 *3.3.10.3* #4604 (Security Bug) *3.3.10.2* #4568 Security Patch
